ComicInfo.Series: Brian Pulido's Medieval Lady Death Belladonna
ComicInfo.Summary: Pulido's warrior women of medieval times meet for the first time in this action-packed crossover! Medieval Lady Death and Wolf, on the run from the evil Bishop Vitirio, try to hide out in Wexford Ireland, but have the misfortune of arriving at the same time as Rurik discovers and ancient talisman he can use to control gargoyles, unleashing a wave of evil that washes over the land. Enter Colleen McGrath, better known as Belladonna, brought back to the living once again to protect her people. But she presumes the threat is from the pale-skinned invader and Lady Death has the fight of her life on her hands! This full color book features art by new sensation Daniel. As well as this regular cover, it is also available with covers by Ron Adrian, Di Amorim, Juan Jose Ryp, a wraparound by Daniel HDR, an Art Nouveau cover by Richard Ortiz and a special Red Leather cover with art by Ron Adrian and limited to just 600 copies!
